2DE2A546402813A0085ADF915DE434CF: Apply a distortion effect to input from a Patchwork audio generator before sending it to an output such as the Patchwork Speaker.
81EBF7AD4CDF702CE639C5899E3BEA04: Apply a distortion effect to input from a Patchwork audio generator before sending it to an output such as the Patchwork Speaker.

Controls how much of a DC offset is applied to the input signal. Increasing this causes the distortion to alter the signal in more destructive ways.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_FabricDistortionEffect_C.Mix.Desc: Determines how much of the audio output is processed by the effect.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_FabricDistortionEffect_C.AllowPor: Determines if the Patchwork Tool can access any cable input or output ports on the device.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_FabricDistortionEffect_C.EnabledO: Determines the game phases during which the device will be enabled. Pre-game includes all phases prior to start of game (like the pre-game lobby or countdown to start of game.) This setting does not affect Edit Mode.
Disables the device when an event occurs.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_FabricDistortionEffect_C.Enable.D: Enables the device when an event occurs.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_FabricDistortionEffect_C.LegalInf: Please note: Use of a Patchwork audio device is limited to the creation of new and original musical works.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_FabricDistortionEffect_C.Style.De: Selects which algorithm is used to distort the audio output.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_FabricDistortionEffect_C.AudioOut: Sets the destination for this device's Audio Out cable.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_FabricDistortionEffect_C.Drive.De: Sets the gain applied to input audio. Higher Drive values will increase distortion.
Sets the inputs for this device's Audio In port.
Sets the inputs for this device's Drive knob.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_FabricDistortionEffect_C.MixIn.De: Sets the inputs for this device's Mix knob.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_FabricDistortionEffect_C.ShatterI: Sets the inputs for this device's Shatter knob.
Sets the inputs for this device's Style carousel.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_FabricDistortionEffect_C.TameIn.D: Sets the inputs for this device's Tame knob.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_FabricDistortionEffect_C.OnDisabl: Triggers an event when the device is disabled.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_FabricDistortionEffect_C.OnEnable: Triggers an event when the device is enabled.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_FabricDistortionEffect_C.Tame.Des: Uses a low-pass filter to reduce harsh high-frequency output caused by distortion. Higher Tame values will filter out more frequencies.
